column2: "Sorry to spring this question on you so suddenly, but what's the best way to get stronger in this world?"
"It's not the type of thing I'd normally ask, but I'd like to hear what you think about it."
"Huh, you say you don't really know either, but you can ask somebody who will?"

"The successor class representatives...
Yeah, they'd have some pretty unique perspectives."
"Alright, you go ask them, and I'll monitor you from here. I'm trusting you with this one!"
